chapter.title: Smooks Graphical Editor Page
chapter.para: Smooks Graphical Editor Page is one tab of the Smooks Form Editor.
This graphical editor could allow user to do drug/drop operations with the nodes of transform data to mapping the source data to target data.
When user save the graphical editor , a Smooks configuration file will be generate.

section.title: Introduce the areas of graphical editor
section.para: Please read the "Quick Start/Smooks Form Editor"

section.title: Load source/target data
section.para: Click the links under the data viewer , the data type selection wizard page will be shown.

There are a sets of transform data type on the wizard page,select one type and click Next , the data source selection wizard page will be shown.
Note
For different data type, the data source selection wizard are different too.

figure.title: Java data source selection wizard page
XML file path selection wizard page

section.para: When finish the data selection(file path selection) , Click Finish , the data viewer will display the selected data structure.

section.title: User the graphical editor to mapping
Error messages
section.para: When user do any mapping operaions , the Smooks tools will validate the "Mapping Logic" , If there is any errors about the "Mapping Logic" ,Some error messages will be shown on the "Error message area".
Please read the "Quick Start/Mapping" to find how to fix the errors.
